Lyric:
[00:27.369]Picture of the moon,
[00:29.599]You gave to me that night.
[00:35.190]The stars were out to play,
[00:42.649]The moon was shining bright.
[00:45.840]If only I had known
[00:51.259]That it would end so soon.
[00:56.819]I was left with a picture of the moon.
[01:04.989]The sound of soft guitars
[01:15.300]Beneath the spanish skies.
[01:17.289]Across the candle lights
[01:22.200]The sadness in your eyes.
[01:28.210]If only I had known
[01:32.250]That it would end so soon.
[01:37.819]I was left with a picture of the moon.
[02:36.549]Picture of the moon,
[02:38.390]You gave to me that night.
[02:43.320]The stars were out to play,
[02:49.390]The moon was shining bright.
[02:54.929]However could I know
[02:59.599]That it would end so soon?
[03:05.920]I was left with a picture of the moon.
[03:16.640]I was left with a picture of the moon.
[03:27.260]All that's left is a picture of the moon.
